sections.label: Replace all Shard Pistols and CCWs

specialRules.hint: This weapon counts as having Rending but only needs rolls of 5-6 to take effect.
specialRules.name: EMP
specialRules.label: EMP
specialRules.description: This weapon counts as having Rending but only needs rolls of 5-6 to take effect.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.
specialRules.name: Graceful Brutality
specialRules.label: Graceful Brutality
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.

specialRules.hint: This model moves 12” when using Advance and 24” when using Rush/Charge.
specialRules.name: Very Fast
specialRules.label: Very Fast
specialRules.description: This model moves 12” when using Advance and 24” when using Rush/Charge.

spells.name: Psychic Fog
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to its next morale test roll.

spells.name: Discord
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Shadow Dance
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Sorrow
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Veil of Madness
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” must take a morale test. If failed it must immediately charge the nearest unit of your choice (friendly or enemy).

spells.name: Light Shards
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 8 automatic hits each.
